text: 23:34 Jeremaia 22:11-12Ezɨ Atrivim Neko, Josaian otarir mam Eliakim ini, egha a Eliakim gamizɨ, a Josaian danganim inigha Judabar atrivimɨn oto. Ezɨ Atrivim Neko Eliakimɨn ziam adegha, ziam Jehoiakim a gatɨ. Egha gɨn Atrivim Neko Joahas inigha Isipɨn kantrin ghu. Ezɨ Joahas Isipɨn ikia ghuava areme.
